'''''thorn''''' is the [[Sindarin]] word for "steadfast".<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], "Words, Phrases & Passages in 'The Lord of the Rings'", ''[[Parma Eldalamberon 17]]'', page 113</ref>

==Examples==
===''thorn''===
* ''[[Arathorn II#Etymology|Ara'''thorn''']]'' (-''thorn'') = Steadfast king
